data.text: @ScottGottliebMD The biggest mistake wasn't made by health experts, it was made by the media and politicians who diefied the health experts, elevating them to god-like status. No one was allowed to question anything and were treated like heretics if they did, including other health professionals.

@ScottGottliebMD Terrible take- the rifts were there long bf this virus and the former president and his enablers decided to make the response political and crippled it. He could have brought the country together over it and raised his stock with many Americans if he had only tried.
@GmenJoe @Freespeech556 @ScottGottliebMD Whatever you need to be comfortable in your sheepfold.

@iriscaroly @ScottGottliebMD @IvankaTrump Breaking news: Biden has been POTUS for over a year. More than twice as many Americans have died of COVID under Biden’s first year in office than died during Trump’s last year in office. We are approaching one million deaths, 700000 of which were under Biden’s cdc and funding!
@iriscaroly @ScottGottliebMD @IvankaTrump Huh? CDC has never been silenced: On-line constantly. CDC problem was that it was always confident, often wrong
